author: Helen Massy-Beresford
title: Avolon Sees Asia-Pacific Driving 2025 Airline Revenue Over $1T
text:
Avolon Sees Asia-Pacific Driving 2025 Airline Revenue Over $1T
[Helen Massy-Beresford](/author/helen-massy-beresford)January 09, 2025
Asia-Pacific growth is expected to help drive global airline revenue over $1 trillion for the first time in 2025, lessor Avolon predicted, also forecasting an increase in net profit for the industry as well as a 20% increase in aircraft deliveries and continued consolidation. The Jan. 10 outlook...
